verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I love Thy kingdom, Lord, The house of Thine abode, The Church our blessed Redeemer saved With His own precious blood.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I love Thy Church, O God! Her walls before Thee stand, Dear as the apple of Thine eye, And graven on Thy hand.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Beyond my highest joy I prize her heav'nly ways, Her sweet communion, solemn vows, Her hymns of love and praise.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Sure as Thy truth shall last, To Zion shall be giv'n The brightest glories earth can yield, And brighter bliss of heav'n. Amen.
